FuncDef: This command statically sets the TCP maximum segment size (MSS) for TCP connections originated from the associated IP interface to the specified value.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the TCP MSS value that should be used in the TCP SYN packet during the three-way handshake negotiation of a TCP connection. Values-536 to 9158 (IPv4)
1220 to 9138 (IPv6).
